channel.title: Watch and help!
channel.description:
oke hey guys. i have npc`s that drops stuff, but my question is. how can i make few items is rare, like it drops 5M,d claws,d bones. how can i make that he drops everytime 5M and like 1:100 d claws.
thanks -gangbuddy-

item.title: Watch and help!
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

NPCdrops.tsm

#Hellhound 49:40 995:30000 995:50000 989:1

let me explain
#Hellhound is your NPC name, (for reference)
49 = NPC id
40 = drop rate on rares
995:30000 normal drop of 30k
995:50000 normal drop of 50k
989:1 rare drop of 1 crystal key every 40 kills

Read full topic
